# submit_assign_sla

Submits a Rubrik SLA change for objects

```py
def submit_assign_sla(self, _object_ids, _sla_id):
```

## Arguments

| Name        | Type | Description                                                                 | Choices |
|-------------|------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------|
| object_ids  | [str] | Array of Rubrik Object IDs |  |
| sla_id  | str | Rubrik SLA Domain ID |  |
